entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pilot Mound 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -11.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or freezing rain beginning this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
